actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and Safety.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 to provide that stone mine operators and sand and gravel mine operators shall not be subject to the requirements of such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 to provide that provisions of such Act shall not apply to stone mining or sand and gravel mining operations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 to provide that stone mine operators and sand and gravel mine operators shall not be subject to the requirements of such Act.
